channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024090732
item.description:
Report X-2024090732

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-15T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-08
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 9/8/2024 at approximately 1130, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 294822 at the ramp facility in Anchorage, reporting a dangerous goods spill. The shipment consisted of one plastic jerrican. The shipment was discovered with a puncture on its bottom, resulting in spillage. The shipment was placed in a salvage drum inverted to prevent further spillage and awaits and amended shipper's declaration for further transport.
